attributes.action: Bring the school year back a half term and put summer in June and July
attributes.additional_details: Move the school year back a half term in order to give us summer in June and July instead of august.
attributes.background: Move the school year back a half term in order to give us summer in June and July instead of august.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about term dates are a matter for individual schools, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
